We were telling stories by the campfire, and now this happens...
Get the freak who killed him!
What in hell?!
We were laughing like good fellas last night, I can't believe it..
What the hell?
I knew the guy. I'm sorry for him.
Might've committed suicide.
Haven't seen this kind of shit in a while.
I knew he was gonna get into this...
You'll be remembered.
Another one...
Yeeeah...
Egh, wouldn't have been a day in the Zone without someone kicking the bucket...
What's one more?...
Everybody's heading there sooner or later.
You'll be remembered...
Rest in peace.
Damn.
That's the end of him.
It's over for him.
And he said it was charmed! Hah...
And there he goes.
Another one lost in the Zone...
Barman, what do we do now?... Alright, I'll go check the corpse in case there's any info on that flash drive. If anything happens, message me.
Bastards! Motherfuckers! They're not afraid of anything...
Bastards! They killed him! I'm gonna find them, and I'm gonna tear them a new one!
Best pick up his loot while no one's nearby.
Better to die from a bullet to the head than from the teeth of a mutant, trust me.
Wow, he had that freaking shooter and couldn't even defend himself with it... I'm gonna go check it. And remember, I'm first!
Come on man, stay down for another five seconds and I'll take your stuff. Won't be needing it in the next world.
Damn, the crows flew off. There are probably corpses nearby. Be careful.
Damn, what a pity, what else to say...
Dead man, got anything for me?
Dude's dead!
Every day...
Fuck! And I thought I had everything settled...
Fuckers killed a friend of mine! Guys, have you seen who did this? If you see them, shoot me a message!
Good thing he wasn't devoured by a mutant.
Guess things didn't work out for that guy.
Heh.. let's see how much money he's got.
He lived like a dog and died like a dog.
He lived without fear and died without fear!
Hell yeah, that sucker's stuff is mine!
He screwed up...
He was a good man, and good men are hard to come by...
He was a good man...
He was a sucker, and around here ain't no suckers...
He was healthy and strong while he wasn't catching bullets...
Hey, folks! I'm not far, I can help!
His eyes won't be opening anytime soon.
Hot damn, he owes me money!
Huh... Well, Sidorovich, you still owe me even if I didn't kill him!
I'm gonna find whoever did this!
I'm gonna put that fucking asshole in a coffin!
I'm gonna tear those fuckers a new one after what they did to my friend!
I'm not far, I can help!
I bet my ass this ain't gonna be no good...
I don't understand shit.
I had a bad feeling about that guy. Good thing I wasn't nearby.
I knew that man. His passing was necessary.
I saw a pack of wild boars getting fat on radioactive wastes.
Is it true the Scorcher's up and running again? Man, no way to get to the Skadovsk...
I will find those scumbags and turn them inside out.
Less people, more air.
Let's have a drink in his memory!
Let's see how rich you were.
Let's take a look at his goodies.
Man, the kind of pigs that run around here! Who wants some hooves?
Man, we met him just yesterday. Poor guy.
Mutants, bandits, zombies, fanatics, soldiers... Man, everyone wants to get you.
Oh, sweet! Just had a contract on that guy, and he's already kicked the bucket. Less trouble for me!
One more, one less, hah!
Phew! Thank God I didn't go with him today. Didn't have a good feeling about it.
Poor guy...
Put him in a coffin - his body was resting peacefully, but not his dick...
Rest in peace, dude.
Rest in peace. He was a good stalker... I'll go get his PDA and leave the loot alone.
Right, let's check out the dead!
Sad to see this happening...
Serves him right!
Shit, looks like there's shooting nearby.
So, has anyone had time to get his stuff or not?
So, mister Bit-The-Dust, what stuff you got for us?
So, what's the fella got in his pockets?
Stop clogging the channel! A man just died.
Such a pity...
That's how it is.
That's one less.
That's one less old-timer.
That's the end of you, scum.
That's what happens to show-offs.
That boy got trashed so bad...
The boy got wasted...
The non-believers are decreasing in number.
They killed him!
They killed that guy!
Those idiots had it coming.
Those jackals have gone insane, it's about time we waste 'em!
Time to collect some loot!
Uh, what happened here?
Well, he's left this world to go to another. Amen!

Well, he died, so what? And by the way, if you need work, go to Sakharov in Yantar. He pays great money for mutant parts! His assistant Semyonov could also use some help, he always needs help with studying monsters.
Well, he died. Happens to everyone.
Well, lads, we drinking to the soul of the fallen?
Well, well! What do we have here?
Well, well...
Well? Who's gonna help me get those rats?
We were telling stories by the campfire, and now this happens...
What's happening to the Zone? Not long ago we went looking for loot, having mutants and anomalies to worry about... But now, even fellow stalkers are dangerous.
What an unlucky dude...
What can I say? Sucker as always.
What did he have with him? Or did his killer take everything?
What do we do with the loot?
What the fuck...
What the hell, they killed such a nice guy?
When the hell is it gonna end?!...
Why do people shoot at each other? It's already hard enough staying alive around here!
A guy died, shit happens. We'll be following him sooner or later anyway.
Ah, the amount of lives the Zone has taken...
Another one gone as mutant food...
Another one waltzing into the Zone, are they ever going to learn? Everybody knows better than going there alone!
Are they infants? Can't even kill a mutant...
Can't take one step without stumbling upon those mutants!
Careful, stalkers! Looks like the mutants are getting all aggressive now that they've got a new den. Best stay away than go charging in like the fucking Superman!
Damn, lots of crows around. Must be corpses stinking somewhere. Take care.
Damn... That's what you get for looting. What a fate.
Fuck, another sod gone.
Fuck, guys, I knew him. We were drinking together just yesterday, and now this happens...
Mutant food?!
Guys! People are dropping like flies, and Duty still says they've cleaned up the territory! Ain't that a bitch?
He was a good man, took a lot of risks and lifted our spirits during hard times... Rest in peace, my stalker brother!
He was a good man...
I'd rip those monsters' balls out so they won't be breeding again!
I'm curious, what kind of creature did that?
I'm freaking out... He said it was safe here... I was lucky refusing to go with him at the last moment, otherwise I'd probably be lying there too...
I found a body! Nobody deserves a death like this.
It's never fun when a stalker gets taken by a mutant... even if he's an enemy.
I told everybody the place was off limits with those things about! Hasn't anybody shared that on the net?
I told him the place was crawling with those bastards! He wouldn't listen, and now this happens to him...
I was lucky to avoid that place!
Just killed a hell of a hog! Got ten kilos of just the hooves!
Killing those bastards left and right, and they only get stronger...
Loser...
Men, I'm fucking pissed at these things...
Men, take note: only a bullet in the head can stop a bloodsucker.
PM me! Let's raid some mutants.
Poor guy got ripped in half! I'd rather shoot myself in the head...
Seen a horde of hogs getting fat on radioactive treats...
Serves him right!
So horrible...
So sad...
That goof couldn't even fight off a hog!
That reminds me of a funny story...
The monster just mutilated him.
This really sucks, people. I hope the poor guy didn't suffer too much...
Those mutants are everywhere now!
Those mutants got downright nasty. I'll go ping Duty about the mess they made.
We cleared the place just yesterday, should have made a trail... Fuck...
Well, fuck that guy!
Well, let's drink to the soul of that man!
Well, that's another one gone. Let our guys know to watch out for mutants.
Well, where did he get mutilated? Gotta note the coordinates...
What's here to say... He was a sucker.
What's there to say? The Zone sure ain't the place for taking a stroll.
What a horrible death! Hope the guy didn't suffer a lot...
What the hell is going on...?
Woah, that man was out of luck!
Woo, check out these hogs! Anybody need a huff?
You're saying a beast got him?
Did they actually die? or joined the zombies?
Everybody's heading there sooner or later.
You'll be remembered...
Rest in peace.
lost to the Zone...
Let's have a drink in their memory!
Poor guys...
Should've be more careful, too late now.
We got used to this after every emission.
People keep getting caught in those storms, a lot just don't make it
They didn't make it in time, poor guys...
That's why you should be fast and aware people.
They got fried...
Fried stalkers everybody!
Tip of today: stay close to your hideout, you can never know when an emission is gonna hit the zone.
Damn, it's really dark now isn't it? stay close to your camp.
Well, fuck. I'm on guard duty this night.
Everyone stay in your camps.
Screw you and your hunting! At night. Hunting snorks... Fucking psychopaths.
Beautiful night...
Yeah, go ahead, hunting down bloodsuckers in the middle of the night like a bunch of dumbasses.
The moon is gonna be up before long. Damn, I feel something is creeping nearby...
Shit! I can barely see the road...
I heard that chimeras only appear at night... is that true?
No, I'm not going anywhere. It's too late...
Well, pussies, time to start shaking.
Is it supposed to be that dark?
I keep hearing sudden sloshing in the dark. It's better to wander somewhere else...
Tonight, mutant activity here is up to eleven, and, well... so is everywhere else, so everybody, stay in your camps!
I heard that burers come to the surface at night... It's better to catch some sleep in the camp.
These roads are no longer safe.
Okay, return to your camps slowly. The Zone is absolutely not safe at night!
Shit. Guys, do what you want, but I'm not going to look for loot today. Night is coming...
Damn, the sun's already going down... I can already feel something unsettling in the vicinity.
It's during moments like this in the morning that I remember my childhood. My village. You get up so early and watch the shadow and light play in your room... It's unreal. Magical.
Almost like evening...
Bricks were shat all night at the camp. Terrible night!
Fucking burers had a yell fest yesterday. Oh, wait... Those were izloms.
Can anyone hear me? A group of our guys went missing tonight. Should have been back by the morning. Still nothing. We'll go looking for them soon. Join us.

Guys, you should see what a dawn is on Yantar. This surely is something... scary, and beautiful... Snork corpses drifting in the sparkling surface of the lake in the morning sun, so cool... Romantic...
Guys, wake up! It's morning already!
Guys, it's dawning... It's so beautiful.
Rise and shine, folks. I'm pretty sure we can get moving already, there's not much we could run into. Not like at night.
Finally, the sky is no longer black. I can move with the damn wildlife gone.
It's morning. Moving forward, it's more or less safe now.
A beautiful dawn! As if in Sevastopol and not here!
Day is breaking...
Egh... I used to have completely different things to do in the morning.
Time to be standing up again, geez.
A terror, not a morning.
Is it morning already? finally.
Damn, who invented morning?... We've been drinking all night...
Even in this place, beauty exists!
Hey, guys! Finally, dawn has come. I'm tired of shaking in fear in the dark. Better to shiver in the light of day...
Boring day.
It's gonna be a long day, isn't it?
The day hasn't ended yet and I feel tired already...
Gotta finish my contract today, won't wait till night hits the zone.
I got many contracts to finish today, accepting all this shit at once was a stupid mistake.
It's gonna be a looooong day guys, I can feel it.
Just for your info, Controllers roam the surface in daylight. Hope that wakes you up.
Finish your work already, unless if you don't mind doing it at night.
I shouldn't have stayed up all night, I feel exhausted.
Boars and fleshes go crazy at this time, don't be a hero and go into a hunting trip alone.
The sunset is beautiful.
Who would've ever thought that such a view is possible even here.
The Zone is not that bad after all.
Almost night, finish your work already.
It's gonna get dark soon, stick your asses around the camps.
Guys, watch the sunset... It's so beautiful.
It's a good time to gather around campfires, what you guys say?
Sun is going down, mutants are waking up.
Huh, am I the only one who felt the day was short?
What a view, won't mind sticking around.
The sky is clear today, sounds like a good time to take a new job.
Feel the fresh air.. oh... forgot about the radiation.
The weather is clear, I can see the horizon.
If it wasn't for radiation, I would take my mask off in this beautiful day.
Who am I kidding? the weather in the zone isn't always that bad.
The weather is nice, there's no excuse to be lazy.
The sky reminds me of my hometown, I miss those ol' sweet days.
Feels good to go out today.
The sky is clear enough today, sounds like a good time to take a new job.
Feel the fresh air.. oh... forgot about the radiation.
The weather is good, I can see the horizon.
If it wasn't for radiation, I would take my mask off in this beautiful day.
Who am I kidding? the weather in the zone isn't always that bad.
The weather is nice, there's no excuse to get lazy.
The sky reminds me of my hometown, I miss those ol' sweet days.
Feels good to go out today.
Seems like rain is coming.
The clouds are getting darker, seems like it's gonna rain soon.
Feels like it's getting rainy soon.
The clouds don't look that good.
Are we expected a storm today?
Some people say having cloudy weather all the time is depressing, I personally like it this way.
The fog is getting thicker, I can't see much shit around.
It's not safe wandering around in this fog.
Fucking fog.
Our enemies might take advantage of the bad weather, keep your eyes peeled.
I'm having hard time making out shit in this fog.
After a second thought, I prefer the rain.
You guys think mutants can spot us in this fog?...
The fog is getting thicker, don't go too far.
It's raining boys.
You know what I really need in this rain? A cigarette, who got some for me?
Let the rain wash your sins away.
I feel like staying inside today.
No thanks, I don't want to get wet today.
I can feel my ass getting wet, should've bought a better outfit.
You guys think mutants hide during rain?...
The rain is getting inside my mask...
Better stay inside until the storm ends.
Storm? right when I'm about to do my contract? What a bad luck.
When this storm is gonna end?
The zone is angry at us.
No thanks, I don't want to get wet today.
You know what I really need in this storm? A guitar, a campfire to sit next to it, and a bottle of vodka.
Shit, my mask... I can barely see in this storm.
You guys think mutants hide during storms too?...
Great... my PDA is wet, just what I really need...
I can feel my ass getting wet, should've bought a better outfit.
Found some good stuff in his backpack.
The bastard got fully pockets.
Now that he's dead, he won't mind me borrowing his stuff.
You don't need your stuff anymore buddy.
His pockets were full.
Uhhh not bad at all, found good shit in his backpack.
He doesn't need his items anymore, I will take them.
Heh, I'm selling his stuff.
Sorry about taking your stuff buddy, but you're dead and I need to survive.
Sorry dead man, but I need your items.
Meh, nothing good, his pockets are empty.
He got nothing special, no money in his pockets too.
Empty pockets... this guy was poor.
Found nothing really that useful, but at least it's something.
I found nothing but shit in his pockets, man I'm unlucky.
Dead bastard, what was he doing in the Zone with empty pockets.
Guess what I found in his backpack, a playboy.... not bad eh?
His backpack is empty... goddamn it!
That bastard was carrying $what, I will keep it.
Found $what in his backpack, this will come in handy.
Would you look at this, he got $what. It's mine now.
$what, that's the best thing I've found on his corpse, won't even complain about it.
I needed this $what. Thanks for saving me from spending money, my dead friend.
He was carrying $what, I will make good use of it.
I'm starting to feel hungry.
I'm a bit tired.
So what's next boss?
What's the plan, $name?
Burers creep the shit out of me. Some say they were a result of secret experiments on criminals, that's how they got their telekinesis powers.
My friend told me once that Pseudogiants are a result of failed experiments in one of those creepy labs, limbs of actual people got used in the process...
I hope we don't meet those creepy things in our way.
I should upgrade my old gun, it's getting rusty.
Anybody knows if an emission's coming soon?
The last emission was a tad too intense.
It's nice to find forgotten bolts in my pockets, you never know when you'll really need them.
I should have hid my stash somewhere else, some bastard might find it sooner or later.
There's been too many people disappearing lately, without leaving a single trace... The Zone's up to something.
Hey, $name, are you rich or something? Looks like it.
I need a drink.
I miss my family, and my old friends.
Such is life in the Zone.
Watch your steps $name, anomalies are all over the place. The last thing I want is a painful death.
Stay away from psi-fields, I have no plans to join those zombies.
They encyclopedia says "Pseudodogs are mutants descended from wolfs"... then why the heck they call them "Pseudo-dogs"?
I should have sharpened my knife, you never know when you'll need free meat.
Believe me when I say this: I don't wanna see a single Chimera in my life.
You hear those growls in the distance? That's a bad sign man.
We should stick close to each others, $name. I got your back.
Maybe that's none of my business, but what brought you here in the Zone, $name?
Freaking psy-dogs can control someone's brain, can you believe that? I'm telling you, I have no plans of being a dog's toy anytime soon.
Sultan is offering new jobs, I need to check them out later.
Got a message from the fellas, they spotted freebies wandering in the Garbage. Heh, we should check out what kind of shit they brought for us.
Eh, $name, my man. You got some smoke?!
That day, I joined the boys into a hunting trip. Hunting dogs and shit is fun you know.
Fucking shit, I forgot my lighter...
I was thinking, is hunting artifacts worth it?
Sultan says that we need to stick our asses around, looks like he got new job for us.
Yo $name, got some vodka?! I need something heavy.
Once I meet with the gang again, we'll go wild to hunt some asses. Those stalkers always have good shit in their pockets.
Those fucks at Cordon think they own the Car Park, someone needs to teach them how things work here.
One of the boys in Agroprom Underground came back to us that day, he talked for hours about all sort of creepy things dwelling in that place. I wouldn't go down there myself.
Duty troops gave our boys at the Garbage a hard time, they want to take control of the area. I hate those scum.
You can never go wrong with hunting eggheads, those nerds usually own expensive detectors and shit.
The bastards from Ukrainian army think they can order people around. Those jokers can't lay a finger on us, I'm telling ya.
Monolith confuses me. Whats your thought about them, $name? Personally, I'm not sure if they got brain cells, or someone's actually controlling them.
I'm tired of hearing stories about Freedom and Duty, To hell with both of them.
There is no law in the zone, people always seem to forget about this.
Yo $name, let me know if you spotted a lonely stalker wandering around, ok?
Stay sharp soldier.
I have orders to shoot bandits on sight.
Don't allow intruders to wander around, we must prevent stalkers from passing through.
We got medical supplies from the HQ yesterday, I need to resupply later.
Talk to the commander if you're looking for a job, he might accept your assistance in few cases.
Being a soldier isn't an easy job, especially in a place like the Zone.
Shit... I forgot my lighter.
We need to get rid of those freedomers forever.
Cold was offering some jobs, you may want to check them out later.
The old team has screwed up, but we will get our full strength back in no time.
Be careful, bandits may show up at any moment.

Ever wondered what happened to Lebedev and the rest of troops after the big emission? Cold says they died, I heard someone say they become monolith soldiers... \nCome to think of it, it's very possible that they're still alive.
I think I caught a frog in my ass, staying at the swamps all the time isn't that healthy.
The Ecologists in Yantar supplied us with new detectors and other equipment, this will help our cause.
I prefer to stay away from military checkpoints, they don't go easy on anyone these days.
Many stalkers joined our side as of late, this is good news.
Latest readings showed that emissions are getting stronger as time passes by, what is the Zone up to?
Psi-storms usually don't participate in artifacts creation, massive blowouts on the other hand are a different story.
What happened to the old team was unfortunate.
Stay sharp soldier.
If you've found any artifacts, bring them to the commander.The scientists will make good use of them.
If you spotted any bandit scum crossing the line, shoot on sight. The last thing we need is scumbags wandering around.
The guards at our base say that mutant activity has increased as of late, the zone is getting more dangerous day after day.
I need to have a nice drink at the 100 Rads.
Have you ever considered the Arena? If you're strong and lucky enough, you can earn yourself quite the sum.
I've just heard that the general has sent new troops over to the old farm in Army Warehouses. If those clowns even dare trying to stop us, we'll make them pay.
Those stalkers think wandering around our base is a bloody joke.
Be careful, no one knows what will show up next. The zone is full of all sort of creepy things.
We got reinforcements and supplies from the Ukrainian Army few days ago, the armors were not bad at all.
Having affairs with bloodsuckers must be fun enough for our bored freedom friends.
I have orders to shoot freedom spies on sight, let me know if you spotted one.
I need to replace my detector, it shows incorrect readings sometimes.
I saw one of the scientists holding a Svarog detector in his hands, it was one of the most beautiful things I've seen in a while.
The Professor is looking for certain artifacts, you might want to help him.
I'm writing a dissertation about Electro anomalies, but I need to collect more samples.
The Ukrainian government approved on sending new equipments, I need to get me an anomaly detector.
Despite the amount of artifacts that can be found there, there is no way I'll ever go near Lab X-16. Controllers and zombies roam around the place.
I heard Hermann once mentioning his intentions of hiring a group of mercs to assist our scientists in Jupiter. I concur, many research groups have disappeared lately.
Funnily enough, bolts are still the cheapest and most effective way to detect anomalous activities around.
Many don't know the difference between a Whirligig and a Vortex; the latter has a much larger range. Many have died due to wrong estimations between both kinds.
I heard that the fabled Heart of the Oasis artifact can even nourish the bearer. This is a miracle to science and medicine.
Gas anomalies are rare, but they share similar properties to those of the Fruit Punch.
Burnt Fuzz is the least dangerous type of anomalies, stalkers die to it because they don't expect an anomaly above their heads.
Psi-storms usually don't participate in artifacts creation, massive blowouts on the other hand are a whole different story.
Stay sharp, duty scumbags may show up anytime.
Voronin keeps sending scouts at that farm over the hill. They never learn, don't they?
Hey $name, if you're feeling sick, let me know and I will let my friend patch you up, you won't regret it.
"Putting order in the zone", best joke I've ever heard.
Monolith forces are giving our guys at the barrier a hard time. It was never easy actually, I don't envy them.
Gotta admit, Duty did a great job protecting the bar from the dogs so far. That's impressive.
Yo $name, got a lighter? I forgot mine in the camp.
I don't mind having the bandits around, as long as they stay out of our way.
There is no law in the zone, gotta keep that in mind.
Shit, I feel a bit dizzy.
Sooner or later, we will free the zone from those who abuse its treasures.
To be honest, I don't really feel comfortable about killing all those people. But hey, work is work, and I need to make a living.
The scientists were looking for bodyguards, they're having a hard time dealing with mutants and bandits.
One of my clients asked me to go with him hunting artifacts. I refused, that's not what I was trained for.
Dushman got new contracts for us, I will check that out on my way back.
Being a hitman isn't an easy thing.
If you need something get done, I can offer my services... At the right price, of course.
Always go for the squad leader first, this will distract the rest for good.
I can help you with your bounty contracts, we can split the money after that.
Artifacts hunting is actually quite common among mercs, especially those who prefer to stay away from killing others.
I always keep a pistol around, you can never go wrong with a reliable, fast pistol.

I wonder what happened to Scar, you know the legendary merc who assisted Clear Sky before the big emission right?\nPeople say he died, other say he became a monolith leader... Is it possible that he might still be alive?
You can make easy money out of Freedom - Duty conflicts, both offer assassination contracts on each other's targets.
Monolith assassination contracts make me nervous... don't you dare telling anyone that I've said that.
As long as bandits don't interfere with my contracts, I don't mind seeing them around.
Stalkers are usually the easiest targets in the Zone, sometimes I feel bad about killing one.
My friend found some rare artifacts in Zaton, I need to get a good detector.
Those Ukrainian army bastards think they can order stalkers around. "We are here to protect you from the Zone", my ass.
Man, Sidorovich's prices are unbelievable.
Stay alert, bandits may show up anytime soon.
Those goddamn bandits think they can stroll around and rob stalkers just like that, they are gonna pay for it.
Hey, let's avoid the military checkpoints, I don't want to commit suicide today.
I haven't decided yet what's best for me. Artifact hunting is profitable, delivering jobs are not that bad too.
Duty and Freedom confused me for long time, both got good points and ideals.
I can still hear duty megaphones inside my head, what the hell...
$name, have you ever considered the Arena? Seems like a good deal.
I wanna visit the 100 Rads bar. Barkeep got all sort of drinks, and I'm in the mood for one.
Moving out from Cordon to Rostok isn't a piece of cake, you can thank bandits for that.
Beard was offering jobs about hunting specific artifacts, too bad I don't own a good detector...
My friend said once to never trust a merc. You might be his friend today, and his contract tomorrow.
I came here looking for work and opportunities, I want throw my old life behind. What about you $name?
Brother, show no mercy to those who stand against the Monolith's will.
May the Monolith be with you, $name.
We thank you, oh Monolith, for revealing the cunning plans of your enemies to us.
We need to avenge our fallen brothers, let's move.
Clear Sky paid for intruding on The Monolith's plans once, others will follow.
$name, The Monolith has blessed us with wonderful artifacts, bring as many as you can find to our base.
Be careful brother, the enemy may show up at any moment.
Bring death to those who spurn the holy power of the Monolith.
I'm so used to this place, it's getting really old.
Home sweet home.
Are we staying here for long?
Feels good to be here. Our fellas are guarding the place.
I need to explore the rest of the Zone, staying here won't help.
Been here for quite long time.
I'm not comfortable with this...
Would you look at this place...
This used to be a town built for the engineers and the personnel working at the Chernobyl NPP...
It was quite a big place once, it is a ghost town now, with mutants and monolith as the only residents.
The famous Ferris Wheel... it's even bigger than what I imagined.
The former Pripyat sports stadium become a large battleground for monolith forces now.
So visiting this place is your greatest idea?!
We are crossing enemy lines, I hope you know what you're doing...
Get ready for monolith troops, they will show up at any moment now.
Why did I agree on coming along with you...
Rookies' home, everyone starts from somewhere after all.
The border, I won't mind staying here.
The Ukrainian Military guards couldn't stop stalkers from breaking through, after all.
How's that old fat ass doing these days... Still ripping people off I presume.
Stalkers spotted bloodsuckers near the tunnels once. It's not safe, not even here.
One day you see bandits inhabiting The Vehicle station, next day it's the loners' turn.
The Railway bridge used to be the second gate to the zone, I don't think the army has control over it anymore.
The Mill is a good place to hide a stash, stalkers usually don't stay in there.
If I'm not mistaken, there is a technician in the northern farm.
The situation at the outpost is unstable. Many parties are fighting over it.
This graveyard gives me the creeps, I heard many stalkers died while moving between the vehicles.
Would you look at this, what a shitty depressing place.
Duty and bandits have presence here, but no one goes deep enough.
Stay away from the middle area, I don't wanna be food for bloodsuckers today.
Those tanks and vehicles lying around are quite radioactive, you better have a good gas mask.
Vortex anomalies are common around here, watch your steps.
You can hide in the camp in the northeastern side. It's a good place to stay safe from emissions.
Eh, we got a long road ahead of us.
You know what we really need right now? A freaking car.
Be careful, I feel like something is waiting for us behind those trees.
Bandits usually hide at the bridge, awaiting for freebies to show up.
Pseudodogs are quite common here, I hope we don't meet a hungry one.
Looking at the rails, this place used to be a big train station. now it's just an empty forest.
We can stop by the warehouse to rest for a bit, although I'm not sure who's controlling it.
I hate swamps.
What are we exactly doing here? Watching the frogs?
This place is no joke, walk in the water for few minutes if you want to join the zombies.
No one knows what's waiting for us behind those reeds.
The view isn't that bad.
I think I caught bugs in my ass, and staying in this swampy place isn't helping it.
It looks like Clear Sky is back in business. I can't say the same for the Renegades though.
Did you know, the swamps were not always marshland. This area used to be a farming region, with villages and fields.
If I'm not mistaken, the Pump station has been built in order to extract anomalous substances from the bottom of the swamps.
There's a Machine yard near the northeastern part, Renegades used to control the place.
Have you ever been to the old church? It's beautiful yet creepy in the same time.
You can find some stashes in those farms... if you're lucky enough.
I... I can't believe my eyes..... we made it to the center!
I'm still alive...
The center of the zone... the Chernobyl Nuclear Power plant is lying right in front of us...
We made it...
After all this time, the Power Planet itself...
The Center... We've finally made it to the center...
I have never been this nervous in my whole life...
This place is so quiet, and creepy.
Ever wondered what kinds of stuff we can find in those buildings?
Watch your steps, a friend of mine once told me about old forgotten mines lying around.
Monolith squads roam the area in the north, they come from the Hospital.
The mercenaries are having a hard time holding the road to Dead City.
I have a feeling that one day the Monolith will seize control over the whole city.
Zombies wander around the area, it's called Dead City after all.
I wonder if we can find anything good inside those buildings.
The situation here is tense, mercs and bandits are known for fighting each others over the mid area.
The main base for the mercs is here, usually they don't allow outsiders to wander near their hideout.
The statue of Lenin is bigger than what I imagined.
Mercs took control over the sports centre. Bandits got the old school.
You know, the city was stripped of most of its valuables. Now it's an empty shell of its former self.
My friend told me about a tunnel system beneath the city, a whole grid connects every building around.
I can feel the psi-waves already.
The miracle machine exists somewhere around here. It's quite dangerous to get in range.
I don't wanna be zombies' soup today, let's keep moving.
When someone mentions Yantar, the first two things that come to my mind are zombies and snorks.
Eve if you can make your way to Dead City from here, mutants up in here may not like it.
Yantar wasn't always a swampy, desolate place you know. A long time ago it was a large lake.
The infamous Lab X-16 is right beneath us, and I don't feel really comfortable about knowing that...
Sometime after the Zone's appearance, Yantar was chosen as a prime location for the mobile science lab...\nNot the best decision if you ask me.
Hearing stories about the massive zombies waves over here, the psi-emitter is probably bigger than what I imagined.
I wonder if there are actual bloodsuckers in that abandoned village... On a second thought, never mind.
Those anarchists roam the area around, heard they had a hard time defending the barrier from Monolith forces, heh.
I would keep my ass away from that village if I were you.
The warehouses are bigger than I expected them to be. Freedom picked an ideal spot for their operating base.
Freedom kicked the remaining military units out of here after the big emission, they stormed this place and occupied the area.
Mercs usually controls the northern outpost, but they never go further than that.
The farm at the northern side is a nice place to hide, only if there's no other squad over there.
Duty usually send their scouts over the farm on that hill.
Watch your head when you cross the village, Burnt Fuzz anomalies are quite common there.
Comet anomalies usually roam the village. It's normal to find fried stalkers lying around the place.
Be careful, this place is quite dangerous.
Snorks and Poltergeists are quite common around here, keep your eyes open.
Stalkers found rare artifacts here. The underground tunnel is known for nice artifacts, but the amount of Electro anomalies there will change your mind.
The mercs are trying so hard to hold that outpost near the tunnel, but they don't always win.
Some of the worst mutants inhabit the mid area, I heard horrific stories about stalkers dying over here...
The tunnel leading to Yantar has Burners and Comets anomalies, basically a big fucking oven!
Keep your eyes on the vehicles around, snorks usually hide between them.
Here you can find either valuable artifacts, or instant death.
What a creepy place.
A while ago, I've heard that a group of stalkers saw creepy creatures coming out from the lab around here. Sounds like a bad deal.
This place has always been gloomy.
There's supposed to be a lab somewhere around here...
Freedom used to control the place before the big emission. When moved over to the Army Warehouses, bandits took control here.
Lots of stalkers died here. This place is no joke.
A friend of mine once told me that Strelok used to have a hideout in the underground tunnels, I wonder whats left of it.
The Ukrainian military have the upper hand over the area, but that didn't prevent stalkers from sticking around in the utility building.
Duty used to control the research institute before the big emission.
Let's stay out of the underground section, I heard stories about dangerous anomalies and nightmarish creatures flooding the tunnels.
This is one big messy place.
Stay away from the radioactive wastes, I don't want to lose my skin.
What are we doing in the garbage anyway?
You can never guess what you can find in this graveyard.
Right after the power plant's reactor meltdown, whole heaps of radioactive waste were dumped here by the Ukrainian government.
This place swarms with rookie stalkers, with the occasional group of bandits loitering around, always on the lookout for freebies.
There are some artifacts to be found here, but most of them are just not worth the effort.
Loners and Bandits are always trying to get their hands onto the best loot, most often leading to fighting and bloodshed.
Bandits have taken hold of the old train hangar for quite a long time now.
Duty always sends their troops over the northern checkpoint at the entrance leading to the Bar. They don't allow anyone to pass through.
The western side is quite dangerous. Mutants hide between the trees over there, waiting for the next free meal.
If you're looking for artifacts, your best pick would be the Vehicle graveyard, or the radioactive swamp on the other side.
Hey, wanna have a drink at 100 Rads?
Those freaking megaphones are so loud...
Every time I come in here, that stupid guard tells me to get out of here. Does that fucker think he owns the place or something?
That guard at 100 Rads is a good fella, he always welcome me inside.
I need to buy some food and ammo from the Barkeep, hope his prices are reasonable.
Duty won't allow anyone going near their headquarters.
This place give me the creeps, keep your eyes open and stick close
Gotta be extra careful, all sort of dangerous mutants dwell in this place.
It's easy to vanish without leaving a trace here, no matter how lucky you have been in life so far.
I wonder how's that old guy doing these days.
Anomalies are everywhere in the forest, watch your steps.
The forest's gate witnessed heavy firefights between different factions. It was never a quiet place here.
You may find some rare artifacts in the old mines, but you should know that stalkers usually vanish in there.
The Symbiont anomaly lies deep within the forest. It looks like two giant claws.\nIf the rumors are true, it holds all sorts of artifacts inside its core.
Freedom from the south, monolith from Radar, bandits at the bridge, stalkers near Forester's tower.\nA usual day in the Red Forest.
Can we stay away from this place...
I have a bad feeling about this.
We are crossing the red line, are you sure about what you're doing?
It's easy to vanish without a trace here, no matter how lucky you have been in life so far.
Whoever gets close to the Brain Scorcher immediately goes insane, turns into a zombie and starts stalking the Zone restlessly...
Is visiting this place your greatest idea?!
I'm a bit nervous...
Monolith squads may show up at any given moment now.
Road's dominated by monolith forces, the forest side is known for being inhabited by the worst kinds of mutants. It's a suicide on both ways.
Rare artifacts lie deep in the forest, good luck in reaching them.
Watch out! Those vehicles are highly irradiated, keep your distance.
I can hear voices inside my head...
I... I can't believe my eyes... we made it to the center!
I'm still alive...
The center of the zone... the Chernobyl Nuclear Power plant is lying right in front of us...
We made it...
After all this time, the Power Planet itself...
The Center... we've finally made it to the center...
I have never been this nervous in my whole life...
What an empty place, quite depressing actually.
I wonder if we can find anything good inside those buildings.
This used to be a town built for engineers working at the Chernobyl NPP.
What used to be a booming city once, it's a ghost town now, with mutants and zombies as its only residents.
I've heard that one of those creepy labs is somewhere around here.
Laundromat became a hideout for stalkers here.
This goddamn place confuses me... where was the entrance we came from?!
The Monolith used to have a psi-emitter in that school, it's broke now.
Department and Grocery Stores are nearby, wanna go shopping?
The hospital is probably the biggest building around here, Monolith squads might be hiding in there.
All kinds of creatures roam around this big area.
Looking at the factory, I wonder what's holding inside it.
Heard once that Jupiter was Strelok's preferred area to operate within the Zone.
Freedom managed to take control over the station, after all.
Jupiter is known for having all sort of mutants around.
This area used to be an active train station before the accident.
My friend were telling stories about the big factory that day, said that many mercs and bandits squads have vanished there without a trace...
Do you believe the stories about the Oasis?
The rail tunnels are known for being inhabited by creepy mutants, mostly groups of burers. Honestly, I would steer clear from there.
The cooling tower is one hell of a view, people say that anxious radio transmission fragments can be heard while passing through.
Kopachy village near the cooling tower is swarmed with zombies, not to mention the radioactive shit lying there.
Some stalkers found Soul artifacts in the Concrete Bath Anomaly near the factory, I should check that out too.
See the Substation Workshop over there? The "Quarry" Anomaly is in the middle, right in the swamp. You will turn into a skeleton in a matter of seconds there.
A few years ago, the Ukrainian Military was investigating helicopters crash sites here. There's one in the factory if I'm not mistaken.
You can go through the abandoned underground tunnels to reach the outskirts of Pripyat. Not a bad choice if you want to avoid going through Prypiat.
You can see the whole area if you climb up the old Cement Factory, it's a perfect spot for sniping.
They say that the oasis lies beneath the Ventilation Complex.

Many people talk about the wonderful Oasis, but it seems that nobody has ever seen it. One of our guys said it's like healing waters. If you walk in, your wounds heal and your energy is replenished...
The bandits are hiding at the Container Warehouse because it's far away from the rest of locations in Jupiter.
I'm not fan of swampy areas, but this one isn't that bad.
You can find all kind of artifacts here.. and anomalies... and mutants..... Let's just keep moving.
I think I caught bugs in my ass, and staying in this swampy place isn't helping it.
The stalkers at the Skadovsk kicked the rest of the bandits a long time ago.
Zaton is also called "Backwater"... makes sense.
Those rusty ships can save your ass once an unexpected blowout hits.
The trucks on the Preobrazhensky bridge might contain some forgotten valuables, I should check that out later.
Mercs are still holding the Waste Processing Station, they don't allow outsiders to pass through.
Have you seen the Sawmill before? it's usually empty, maybe few zombies are roam around.
I heard that many stalkers vanished while exploring the Krug Antenna Complex in the west, better keep my ass away of it...
There's a guy called Noah near here, my friend told me he tamed a Pseudodog! I won't believe him until I see that myself.
Watch out when you go near the Fueling Station. Many mutants hide there, and they're usually hungry.
The Claw anomaly here in Zaton is probably the biggest of its kind, not to mention all the goodies inside. But be aware of the snorks flooding the caves nearby.
Ever wondered how the Scar anomaly got carved? Just look at it through your PDA's map.
The circus Anomaly has a fitting name, getting an artifact from there requires constant jumping. Don't forget to bring a good SEVA suit.
You might find an Electro in the Iron Forest anomaly. Be careful though, Poltergeists are waiting for careless stalkers over there.
Your name is $name, right? You're new around here or something?
$name?... I don't recall you, you're new here?
You haven't spent much time in the zone, right $name? Seems like it.
Feels good to join a guy who knows what he's doing, $name.
Your name is $name? my PDA says you have quite the experience, glad to have your company.
You're $name?! I heard a lot about your adventures back at our campfire last night. My friends said you're one of few who survived long enough.
You're $name, right?! My friends said you're a real veteran.
$name?! People say you're a real hero. Maybe I can learn from your experience.
I can't believe it... the living legend, $name himself!
The legendary $name?! I feel blessed already.
Is this real... It's $name! you have my utmost respect.
You're $name? I've heard that you did some bad shit...
You're $name? you got quite the "reputation" around here.
$name? I think I've heard about you, some people are quite angry due to your actions.
People say you fucked up big time, $name. What have you done exactly?
$name... I don't recall your name.
Your reputation seems fine enough, $name.
$name, you seems like a nice guy. Are you new around here?
My PDA doesn't show much info about you $name. That's a good thing, I guess.
You're $name right? I've heard good stuff about you that day, keep it up.
Your name is $name? I've heard that you help stalkers around, that's so nice of you.
$name? I heard about you that day, you got a good reputation among stalkers.
I think I heard about you, $name. My friends said you're good at what're doing.
People say that you're a man of your word, $name. I'm glad to join your team.
